text.title: Start a Primary School Media and School Newspaper Publishing Company

head.s: Start a Primary School Media and School Newspaper

p.s: Are you keen on running your own mini-media empire at an early age in school ?
This can be a fantastic grounding for a future career and gives you a very early opportunity to learn about managing people , deadlines , and expectations .
This article provides a brief overview of the things to consider when developing your publishing company .

item.s: Build your team of at least 4 " staff " .
You will likely have to double up on a number of the tasks and have each person responsible for several jobs .
Jobs could be :

figure.rend: Start a Primary School Media and School Newspaper Publishing Company Step 1.jpg

item.s: reporter
photographer
editor
sub-editor
picture-editor
columnists
researchers
You will also need to consider the need for a :

figure.rend: Start a Primary School Media and School Newspaper Publishing Company Step 2.jpg

item.s: complaints officer ; and/or a PR Manager
In addition to your staff you may need a board of directors , consisting of :

figure.rend: Start a Primary School Media and School Newspaper Publishing Company Step 3.jpg

item.s: A President , Vice President , Treasurer , Secretary , and representatives from all 4 classes , the board of directors President , VP , Treasurer and Secretary should be appointed by the representatives , and the representatives should be appointed be the class officers .
Give your newspapers(s) a cutting edge name .
Brainstorm with your team for a suitable name .

figure.rend: Start a Primary School Media and School Newspaper Publishing Company Step 4.jpg

item.s: Decide how many pages you will have and what will be the contents .

figure.rend: Start a Primary School Media and School Newspaper Publishing Company Step 5.jpg

item.s: Use a page layout and word processing program to build your paper .
Suggestions are in tips .

figure.rend: Start a Primary School Media and School Newspaper Publishing Company Step 6.jpg

item.s: Cut down on ink and paper ; try to get your school to print it .

figure.rend: Start a Primary School Media and School Newspaper Publishing Company Step 7.jpg

item.s: Decide a price , it can be free if you have ads in it or sponsors .
Your team will need to go around and rally sponsors and funds for it if you do not sell it .
Even if you have sponsorship , you might need to sell it to cover overheads and to give the paper value in people 's minds .
People often dismiss that which is freely given .

figure.rend: Start a Primary School Media and School Newspaper Publishing Company Step 8.jpg

item.s: Try to get people into it .
Be a motivator and sell the virtues of being a part of the newspaper team for their future careers , their sense of community involvement and their love of helping others and writing .
Be careful not to overdo it though and use people up .
Everyone deserves a fair go and nobody should be left feeling that they have been used up when they are volunteering their time , efforts , and ideas .
Recognize their efforts and reward them in appropriate ways as possible .

figure.rend: Start a Primary School Media and School Newspaper Publishing Company Step 9.jpg

item.s: Write your articles in a word-processor first .

Suggestions include
OpenOffice.org Writer
, Corel WordPerfect , AbiWord , Apple Pages and Microsoft Word .
Use desktop publishing ( DTP ) software .

The industry standard is QuarkXPress and Adobe InDesign , but for a free alternative , try
Scribus
.
A cheap alternative is Serif PagePlus .
If you already paid for Microsoft Office , there is Publisher in some ( but not all ) editions .
